title: For those who feel guilty about not voting
author: VD
content_html: The Onion has some suggestions. Personally, I prefer the head-on approach of telling the insistent voter that I wouldn’t vote for anyone on the ballot in 2008 if voting was mandatory and punished by a jail sentence. To vote for the lesser of two evils is to serve evil; there is no such thing as a vote “against” in American presidential politics.
content_text:
The Onion
has some suggestions
.  Personally, I prefer the head-on approach of telling the insistent voter that I wouldn’t vote for anyone on the ballot in 2008 if voting was mandatory and punished by a jail sentence.  To vote for the lesser of two evils is to serve evil; there is no such thing as a vote “against” in American presidential politics.
